channel.title: 2 simple questions
channel.description:
Hey, when i attack an NPC it shows the damage on the npc but my weapon doesn't move. nothing moves. But when i go and pk people, my weapon moves normally. any ideas on how to fix that?
and how can i get something like this?
[img]http://i951.photobucket.com/albums/ad351/tman915/options.png?t=1266879195[/img]
so that when i click a portal it gives me all those options, and when i click one of them, it teles me there! thanks!

item.title: 2 simple questions
item.dc:creator: @Superd00d Superd00d
item.description:
@Superd00d wrote:

public void XXXXXXX() { interfaceEffect = 20; clearQuestInterface(); sendFrame126("", 2494); sendFrame126("I want to teleport to XXXXXXXXXXX!", 2495); sendFrame126("", 2496); sendFrame126("No, I'm not ready yet.", 2497); sendFrame126("", 2498); sendQuestSomething(8143); sendFrame164(2492); flushOutStream(); }
Try that? It was a code I found laying around my old sources.
